content.command.auction.description: Announce the start of the roll of the item from the auction
content.command.auction.option.item.description: Screenshot of the item from the auction
content.command.auction.option.count.description: Count of lots with this item
content.command.auction.option.role.description: Role of clan members, who can participate
content.command.nicknames.description: Collect all nicknames from given images and show them as text
content.message.auction.prepare: An important item is in auction. Start the roll...
content.message.auction.results:
Winners: {winners}
You can bid on the auction in the game.
content.message.auction.no_participants:
{role}
–¢o one wanted to participate in the roll. Everyone can bid on the auction in the game.
content.message.auction.wrong_attachment: You must to apply an screenshot of lot
content.message.auction.wrong_time: Time until the roll set wrong (ex 2h 30m)
content.message.auction.only_in_channel: Functions of auction are available only on a server
content.message.locale.only_in_channel: Language settings available only on a server
content.message.locale.only_for_administrator: Language settings available only for server administrators
content.message.command.error: An error has occurred while executing the command
